doc:
Barbara Barrie https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barbara_Barrie 0 Barbara Barrie (born Barbara Ann Berman, May 23, 1931) is an American actress of film, stage and television. She is also an accomplished author. Her film breakthrough came in 1964 with her performance as Julie in the landmark film One Potato, Two Potato, for which she won the Best Actress Award at the Cannes Film Festival. She is best known for her role as Evelyn Stoller in Breaking Away, which brought her an Academy Award nomination for Best Supporting Actress in 1979 and an Emmy Award nomination in 1981 when she reprised the role in the television series based on the film. Barrie also is known for her extensive work in the theatre, receiving a Tony Award nomination for Best Featured Actress in a Musical in 1971 for originating the role of Sarah in Stephen Sondheim's Company. Barbara_Barrie ( born Barbara_Ann_Berman , May_23_,_1931 ) is an_American_actress of film_,_stage_and_television . She is also an_accomplished_author . Her_film_breakthrough came in 1964 with her_performance as Julie in the_landmark_film One_Potato , Two_Potato , for which she won the_Best_Actress_Award at the_Cannes_Film_Festival . She is_best_known for her_role as Evelyn_Stoller in Breaking Away , which brought her an_Academy_Award_nomination for Best_Supporting_Actress in 1979 and an_Emmy_Award_nomination in 1981 when she reprised the_role in the_television_series based on the_film . Barrie also is_known for her_extensive_work in the_theatre , receiving a_Tony_Award_nomination for Best_Featured_Actress in a_Musical in 1971 for originating the_role of Sarah in Stephen_Sondheim 's_Company .
